org.openscience.cdk.controller
Interface IController2DModule

All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller2DModuleAddAtom, Controller2DModuleChangeFormalC, Controller2DModuleHighlight, Controller2DModuleMove, Controller2DModuleRemove, ExampleController2DModule
public interface IController2DModule

Interface that Controller2D modules must implement. Each module is associated with an editing mode (DRAWMODE_*), as given in Controller2DModel.

Author:
egonw
See Also:
Controller2DModel
Belongs to CDK module:
control
Source code:
revision 9162
